original_text: And he said also unto his disciples, There was a certain rich man, which had a steward; and the same was accused unto him that he had wasted his goods.
korean_text: 또한 제자들에게 이르시되 어떤 부자에게 청지기가 있는데 그가 주인의 소유를 낭비한다는 말이 그 주인에게 들린지라

sentences.original_text: And he said also unto his disciples
There was a certain rich man
and the same was accused unto him
that he had wasted his goods
